page.title: 19HOME ENTERTAINMENT cont'd
page.content: {COLOUR TELEVISION The most popular form of entertainment 72% possess l set;18% have 2 sets & 6% 3 or more sets. 4% do not have a colour T.V. {BLACK & WHITE TELEVISION Popular as a second T.V.,often used by children in their bedroom. 59% possess 1 set,11% have 2 sets and 1% 3 or more. {MUSIC CENTRES}(combined radio, cassette & record player) A popular possession. 68% have 1, 20% have 2 and 1% has 3 or more. {CASSETTE PLAYERS} ( for tapes) 42% HAVE 1,21% have 2 & 13%,3 or more. {PORTABLE RADIO}(BATTERY OR MAINS) 50% have 1,13% have 2 & 6%,3 or more. {CLOCK RADIO}(Bedside alarm system) 42% have 1,13% have 2 and 4 homes 3 or more.
